name: RIT Capstone Poster Template & Design Elements
description:
Preparing for a capstone poster presentation at RIT and want to stand out? How about designing a visually appealing and concise poster that will grab conference-goer's attention about your research project?


I made this out of frustration because of a lack of good design elements for my undergraduate capstone poster, and decided to make something better.


Like my work? Want to remix it for your own? Feel free! If this template does help you in any substantive way, I'd love it if you sent me an email to let me know. :)
